subject: RE: [junit] Re: UnsatisfiedLinkError: Native Library  already loaded in another classloader
msgSnippet: ... have you tried the fork= yes attribute of the junit task? Bernd
messageBody:
> But, I did not have the problem with the TestRunners, only Ant's
> <junit> task. Hmmm...

have you tried the fork="yes" attribute of the junit task?

Bernd
